trans-unit.resname: WHO·169 | Wreck and Rebuild | Card Name
WHO·169 | Wreck and Rebuild | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Mill five cards, then you may put a land card from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.
Flashback {3}{R}{G}
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～•消灭目标神器或结界。•磨五张牌，然后你可以将一张地牌从你坟墓场横置放进战场。返照{3}{R}{G}
